name: Your Path In Life (Concept Testing)
description:
Solve 60 official puzzles, and many more created by the players' community.

Learn how to alter the world, creating and removing paths, in order to allow yourself and friends met along the way to move through life and solve the puzzles.

Forget about time or movements restrictions, embrace the relaxing atmosphere, beautiful sounds, smooth movements and focus on the puzzle.

Have you master the game? Create your own puzzles with the Level Editor and share your creations with other players!
